stimulusHtml: Which of the following methods can be added to the  Pair  class to allow other classes to modify the value of y?

features.html:
Consider the following class declaration.

 

public class Pair
{
   private int x;
   private int y;
   
   public Pair(int x1, int y1)
   {
      x = x1;
      y = y1;
   }
   
   public int getX()
   {
      return x;
   }
}

choicesHtml:
private int setY(int num)
{
   return num;
}

public int setY(int num)
{
   return num;
}

private void setY(int num)
{
   y = num;
}

public void setY(int num)
{
   y = num;
}
